Constructor Detail

Game

public Game()
Create the game and initialise its internal map. This is only used by the main method in the SilentAssault class, but can be used independently ONLY if the SilentAssault class is available to use its public fields.

Method Detail

play

public void play()
Main play routine. Loops until end of play. This should not be run on the same instance after the game is lost, but as long as the game is run from the SilentAssault class's main method, this is not an issue.
